moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: Power Trip
moves.effect: The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the power of this move.

moves.name: Aura Wheel
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 1 stat rank. When the user is in Full Belly Mode, this attack becomes Electric type. When the user is in Hangry Mode, this attack becomes Dark type.

moves.name: Snack Time!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 1 stat rank. When the user’s Speed is raised, also raises the user’s Attack by the same amount. When the user is in Full Belly Mode, applies the Gradual Healing effect to it. When the user is in Hangry Mode, raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank.

syncMove.name: Hangry Wild Charge
syncMove.description: When the user is in Hangry Mode, the user changes to Full Belly Mode. This move’s power increases when the target is paralyzed.

passives.name: Mode Swing
passives.description: When the user is in Full Belly Mode, powers up its Electric-type moves. When the user is in Hangry Mode, powers up its Dark-type moves.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 5
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Hunger Switch
passives.description: After the user’s Pokémon uses a move, it switches between Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode.

grid.bonus: Thunder Shock:Move Gauge Refresh 4- Has a chance (50%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Thunder Shock:Staggering 2- Has a chance (30%) of making the target flinch when the user’s attack move is successful.
Power Trip:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Aura Wheel:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Aura Wheel:Ramming Speed- The more the user’s Speed is raised, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Snack Time!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Snack Time!:Propulsion 4- Has a chance (50%) of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when the user’s move is successful.
Snack Time!:Super Preparation 4- Has a chance (50%) of applying the Supereffective ↑ Next effect to the user when its move is successful.
Lithe- Prevents the user from getting paralyzed.
Speedy Entry 1- Raises the user’s Speed by 1 stat rank when it enters a battle.
Inertia- The more user’s Speed is raised, the more it powers up the user’s sync moves.
Static Shock 3- Powers up the user’s sync moves when the target is paralyzed.
MP Rekindle 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP for the user when its Pokémon uses a move.
